attributes.action: Cancel GCSE’s for year tens and other people doing exams next year.
attributes.additional_details: Lockdown is taking a huge chunk out of the academic year.It will be near impossible for the students to recover and learn the curriculum in time for their exams.
attributes.background: Cancel GCSEs for year tens and other people taking exams next year

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petition which call for a very similar, related actions: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306773
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312570.
